ygData.subject: RE: WAaahooo!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah but that s the whole point.  They consider it broken and that s all that really matters as far as Verant is concerned.  What the customer considers broken
ygData.messageBody:
Ah but that's the whole point. They consider it broken and that's all that
really matters as far as Verant is concerned. What the customer considers
broken is of little consequence to them, hence the 6+ month delay in
recognizing that Alenia's Disenchanting Melody was in fact broken.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 1:03 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] WAaahooo!!


From: jhenders@...

On Wed, Jan 26/00, kim@... wrote:
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Wed, 26 Jan 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
> >
> > No one but bards can run and cast a spell at the same time. There is no
> > 'run + spell' animation for anyone else.
>
> The spellcasting animations continue for a few seconds after
> you've completed casting the spell. Before the patch, folks
> who cast a spell and immediately started running would appear
> to glide just like we did.
>

Which was just as cool an effect as the bard "surfing" and makes you
wonder, don't they have better things to do that fix things that no one
considers broken?
